org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.providers
Interface IAeQueueStorageProvider

All Superinterfaces:
IAeStorageProvider
All Known Implementing Classes:
AeSQLQueueStorageProvider, AeXMLDBQueueStorageProvider
public interface IAeQueueStorageProvider
extends IAeStorageProvider

A queue storage delegate. This interface defines methods that the delegating queue storage will call in order to store/read date in the underlying database.

Method Summary
 java.util.List getAlarms()
          Gets a list of all alarms in the database.
 AeAlarmListResult getAlarms(AeAlarmFilter aFilter)
          Gets a list of all alarm in the database that match the given filter.

          Gets a single receive object from the DB, identified by process ID and location ID.

          Journals an inbound receive by putting a record of it in the database and associating attachments to the process.
